Column.Text:
My newly created company CrowdWare is collecting funds

I want to create a company to support the AnimationMaker and I need a small budget to make this happen.

Here is a list of thing I need money for.

  • Registering a non profit company
  • Buying hardware to also port AnimationMaker to MacOS and Windows
  • Pay for Qt licenses
  • Pay for Appstore fees

A few month ago I raised a crowd funding campaign for the AnimationMaker but was not able to collect a cent. Then I decided to continue without a budget. To be able to support the AnimationMaker and to develop it further I need a budget, so I decided to also release commercial licenses for Windows and MacOS. And therefore I have to register my company and I also need a small budget to survive.
Do you like to support my company.IndieGoGo
